      • waitForPlayerToClickRoll

        public void waitForPlayerToClickRoll(int player)
        This method pauses the program and waits for the "Roll Dice" button to get clicked. The program is resumed, when the "Roll Dice" button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        player - An int representing the player

      • highlightPlayer

        public void highlightPlayer(int player)
        This method highlights the player whose turn is on.
        Parameters:
        player - An int representing the player.

      • displayDice

        public void displayDice(int[] intDice)
        This method displays the numbers on the dice after roll.
        Parameters:
        intDice - An array of integers, numbers to get shown on the dice.

      • waitForPlayerToSelectDice

        public void waitForPlayerToSelectDice()
        This method pauses the program and waits for the dice to get selected. The program is resumed, when the "Roll Dice" button is clicked.

      • unselectDice

        private void unselectDice()
        This method sets the select property of each die to false.

        This method returns the select property of a die.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
